title: Webinar Fields

fields.label: Webinar Date
fields.name: webinar_date
fields.instructions: Date of the webinar. Used to determine if it's upcoming or on-demand.

fields.label: Featured
fields.name: webinar_featured
fields.instructions: Mark this webinar as featured. Featured webinars will appear in the top section of the webinars page.

fields.label: Featured Image
fields.name: webinar_featured_image
fields.instructions: Large featured image for the webinar. Used in the featured section of the webinars page.

fields.label: Excerpt
fields.name: webinar_excerpt
fields.instructions: Short description for the webinar. If not set, the WordPress excerpt will be used.

description: Additional fields for webinars including date, featured status, featured image, and excerpt.
